metadata.name: Bypass UAC via CMSTP
metadata.comment: Detect commandline usage of Microsoft Connection Manager Profile Installer (cmstp.exe) to install specially formatted local .INF files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\cmstp.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmstp.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/au')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-au')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/ni')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-ni'))))

output.summary: Detect commandline usage of Microsoft Connection Manager Profile Installer (cmstp.exe) to install specially formatted local .INF files

metadata.objective: Examine fields: ComputerName, actor.user.name, process.cmd_line False positive: Legitimate use of cmstp.exe utility by legitimate user References: https://eqllib.readthedocs.io/en/latest/analytics/e584f1a1-c303-4885-8a66-21360c90995b.html, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1218.003/T1218.003.md, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Cmstp/
